examples: an entreaty to stop the fighting
an appeal to the public to keep calm

definitions.text: attractiveness that interests or pleases or stimulates
examples: his smile was part of his appeal to her

definitions.text: (law) a legal proceeding in which the appellant resorts to a higher court for the purpose of obtaining a review of a lower court decision and a reversal of the lower court's judgment or the granting of a new trial
examples: their appeal was denied in the superior court

definitions.text: request for a sum of money
examples: an appeal to raise money for starving children

definitions.text: take a court case to a higher court for review
examples: He was found guilty but appealed immediately

definitions.text: request earnestly (something from somebody); ask for aid or protection
examples: Invoke God in times of trouble
The idea of a vacation appeals to me
The beautiful garden attracted many people

definitions.text: cite as an authority; resort to
examples: He invoked the law that would save him
I appealed to the law of 1900
